name: NSView.FullScreenModeOptionKey
desc: These constants are keys that you can use in the options dictionary in enterFullScreenMode(_:withOptions:) and exitFullScreenMode(options:).

items.name: static let fullScreenModeAllScreens: NSView.FullScreenModeOptionKey
items.desc: Key whose corresponding value specifies whether the view should take over all screens.

items.name: static let fullScreenModeApplicationPresentationOptions: NSView.FullScreenModeOptionKey
items.desc: Key whose corresponding value specifies the application presentation options.

items.name: static let fullScreenModeSetting: NSView.FullScreenModeOptionKey
items.desc: Key whose corresponding value specifies the full screen mode setting.

items.name: static let fullScreenModeWindowLevel: NSView.FullScreenModeOptionKey
items.desc: Key whose corresponding value specifies the screen mode window level.
